action.des: Defensive Substitution: Paul Janish replaces shortstop Jerry Hairston, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Wes Bankston replaces first baseman Joey Votto, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Danny Richar replaces second baseman Brandon Phillips, batting 4th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Laynce Nix replaces right fielder Jay Bruce, batting 5th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Rosales replaces third baseman Edwin Encarnacion, batting 6th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Jonny Gomes replaces left fielder Chris Dickerson, batting 7th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Hanigan replaces catcher Ramon Hernandez, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: David Weathers replaces Arthur Rhodes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Sean Henry replaces Chris Heisey.

atbat.des: Sean Henry grounds out, second baseman Danny Richar to first baseman Wes Bankston.
Chris Valaika flies out to center fielder Darnell McDonald.
Juan Francisco called out on strikes.

action.des: Sean Henry remains in the game as the right fielder.
Pitcher Change: Misael DeJesus replaces Dallas Buck.

atbat.des: Danny Richar grounds out to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Laynce Nix flies out to center fielder Drew Stubbs.
Adam Rosales doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Sean Henry.
Jonny Gomes doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Drew Stubbs. Adam Rosales scores.
Ryan Hanigan reaches on throwing error by third baseman Zach Cozart. Jonny Gomes scores.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Luis Bolivar replaces Wilkin Castillo.
